mapper.select: select FACTORY_USING.USERUNIQUE, FACTORY_USING.FACTORYID,FACTORY_USING.FACTORYTYPE, FACTORY_USING.SELLPRICE, FACTORY_USING.BEGINTIME, FACTORY_USING.FINISHTIME, FACTORY_USING.PLACE,CAPACITY,count(PRODUCTLINE.PRODUCTLINEID) as PRODUCTLINENUMBER from FACTORYBASIC,FACTORY_USING left join PRODUCTLINE ON FACTORY_USING.FACTORYID=PRODUCTLINE.FACTORYID and FACTORY_USING.USERUNIQUE=PRODUCTLINE.USERUNIQUE where FACTORY_USING.USERUNIQUE=#{userUnique} and FACTORY_USING.FACTORYTYPE=FACTORYBASIC.FACTORYTYPE group by FACTORY_USING.USERUNIQUE,FACTORY_USING.FACTORYID,FACTORY_USING.FACTORYTYPE, FACTORY_USING.SELLPRICE,FACTORY_USING.PLACE,BEGINTIME,FINISHTIME,CAPACITY
